verses.roman:
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bāḍe prabhura ānanda-āveśa
tṛtīya prahara ha-ila, nṛtya nahe śeṣa

synonyms: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe—at every moment; bāḍe—increases; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānanda-āveśa—transcendental bliss; tṛtīya prahara—midafternoon; ha-ila—there was; nṛtya—the dancing; nahe śeṣa—did not end.
translation: His transcendental bliss increased at every moment. Therefore even by midafternoon the dancing had not ended.
